page.title: Weapons and Turrets
page.descr: Names and descriptions of weapons and turrets
page.t: Heavy Lance is a pinnacle of energy weapons collaborative research of Argons and those few Borons who were left within Argon Federation after the Commonwealth collapse. Low rate of fire and turret tracking speed is compensated by incredible range, pinpoint precision and heavy alpha damage that can take any fighter down in one shot. SDPS:1120 HDPS:960 ALPHA(shield):14000

Cyclone turret mounts a pair of Cyclone Beamers, though to fit on turret chassis it was required to decrease output of each single beamer. High precision and fire rate make it a good point-defense system, though damage and range are sub-par. SDPS:143 HDPS:143 ALPHA(shield):95

Heavy Lance is a pinnacle of energy weapons collaborative research of Argons and those few Borons who were left within Argon Federation after the Commonwealth collapse. Low rate of fire and turret tracking speed is compensated by incredible range, pinpoint precision and heavy alpha damage that can take any fighter down in one shot. SDPS:1120 HDPS:960 ALPHA(shield):14000

Cyclone turret mounts a pair of Cyclone Beamers, though to fit on turret chassis it was required to decrease output of each single beamer. High precision and fire rate make it a good point-defense system, though damage and range are sub-par. DPS:143 HDPS:143 ALPHA(shield):95

Heavy Lance is a pinnacle of energy weapons collaborative research of Argons and those few Borons who were left within Argon Federation after the Commonwealth collapse. Low rate of fire and turret tracking speed is compensated by incredible range, pinpoint precision and heavy alpha damage that can take any fighter down in one shot. SDPS:1120 HDPS:960 ALPHA(shield):14000

Cyclone turret mounts a pair of Cyclone Beamers, though to fit on turret chassis it was required to decrease output of each single beamer. High precision and fire rate make it a good point-defense system, though damage and range are sub-par. SDPS:143 HDPS:143 ALPHA(shield):95

Heavy Ion Cannon is larger variant of argon Ion Cannon, providing increased damage and range in the cost of rate of fire. Precision and heat efficiency make it a good weapon to strip large ship shields from afar. SDPS:844 HDPS:219 ALPHA(shield):675

Arc discharges are unique weapon family taking Ion Cannon technology and transforming it into a shotgun, greatly effective at close ranges as anti-shield weapon. This is heavier model of original Arc Discharger that has greater punch and range. SDPS:986 HDPS:258 ALPHA(shield):352
Argon ion technology allowed the creation of specialized anti-shield weaponry. Ion Cannon boasts good accuracy and heat efficiency with moderate rate of fire. SDPS:369 HDPS:69 ALPHA(shield):117
Arc discharges are unique weapon family taking Ion Cannon technology and transforming it into a shotgun, greatly effective at close ranges as anti-shield weapon. SDPS:413 HDPS:116 ALPHA(shield):118
Cyclone Beamer is a beafed up version of Pulse beamer, providing good damage and rate of fire and pin-point accucary.
Lancer is enlarged varient of a Beamer weapon, a bit inefficcient in heat managment it still provides a pin-point precision with quite high damage output.

Pulse Beamer was an attempt to increase heat efficiency of regular beam weapons, while it was a successful endeavor the damage such modification provides was noticeably lower of regular beam weapons, though it is still a popular choice due to its precision and burst damage.
Beamer was developed by Paranids in attempt to miniaturize Argon/Boron Lance weapon technology. The result is a beam weapon that has moderate damage and heat efficiency but incredible precision.

Annihilator was originally called a Particle Cannon, but current name stuck to it due to high damage this weapon can inflict on its target. Low precision, low rate of fire and range (as for capital weapon) is well compensated by sheer destruction force of the projectile. SDPS:2714 HDPS:2000 ALPHA(shield):9500

In the need of low-cost point defense weapon Argons developed a very unique turret platform that has high tracking capabilities that in combination of above avarage rate of fire, good precision and moderate damage proved to be quite good at taking out fighters and missiles. SDPS:300 HDPS:300 ALPHA(shield):10

This turret combines a pair of plasma cannons that were downgraded to fit on rotating platform. Bad precision, long range and high damage make this weapon a good choice to fight medium and large ships. SDPS:552 HDPS:440 ALPHA(shield):690

Annihilator was originally called a Particle Cannon, but current name stuck to it due to high damage this weapon can inflict on its target. Low precision, low rate of fire and range (as for capital weapon) is well compensated by sheer destruction force of the projectile. SDPS:2714 HDPS:2000 ALPHA(shield):9500

In the need of low-cost point defense weapon Argons developed a very unique turret platform that has high tracking capabilities that in combination of above avarage rate of fire, good precision and moderate damage proved to be quite good at taking out fighters and missiles. SDPS:300 HDPS:300 ALPHA(shield):10

This turret combines a pair of plasma cannons that were downgraded to fit on rotating platform. Bad precision, long range and high damage make this weapon a good choice to fight medium and large ships. SDPS:552 HDPS:440 ALPHA(shield):690

Annihilator was originally called a Particle Cannon, but current name stuck to it due to high damage this weapon can inflict on its target. Low precision, low rate of fire and range (as for capital weapon) is well compensated by sheer destruction force of the projectile. SDPS:2714 HDPS:2000 ALPHA(shield):9500

In the need of low-cost point defense weapon Argons developed a very unique turret platform that has high tracking capabilities that in combination of above avarage rate of fire, good precision and moderate damage proved to be quite good at taking out fighters and missiles. SDPS:300 HDPS:300 ALPHA(shield):10

This turret combines a pair of plasma cannons that were downgraded to fit on rotating platform. Bad precision, long range and high damage make this weapon a good choice to fight medium and large ships. SDPS:552 HDPS:440 ALPHA(shield):690

A heavy variant of autocannon that has 6 barrels to allow long bursts. Great at taking down heavy fighters and medium ships, this weapon provides good accuracy, rate of fire and heat efficiency with moderate damage. SDPS:587 HDPS:587 ALPHA(shield):165

Heavy kinetic cannon with low precision, lower than average heat efficiency but with high shield damage due to the sheer mass of its projectile. Usually used by to take down shields of larger ships while still remaining effective at damaging armor. SDPS:682 HDPS:491 ALPHA(shield):1250

Larger Variant of Plasma gun, low precision, incredibly low rate of fire but high damage to both hull and shield make this weapon a choice for pilots who tend to use their ships at anti-large ship duty. SDPS:804 HDPS:675 ALPHA(shield):2680

A shotgun variant of plasma gun developed by some mad Split scientist. While very inaccurate and inefficient this weapons provides one of the highest damage for medium ships and so can melt the target. Usually suggested to be used with hit-and-run tactics. SDPS:864 HDPS:594 ALPHA(shield):480
Cheap and effective small weapon to counter scouts and light fighters. Moderate damage, great accuracy and high heat efficiency. SDPS:213 HDPS:213 ALPHA(shield):17

Inaccurate cannon with rapid reload mechanism, high shield damage provides capability for smaller ships to fight more heavy targets while effective against shields and armor. SDPS:273 HDPS:202 ALPHA(shield):341

Plasma gun is a standard-issue weapon for heavy fighters that tend to be used in attack runs on large ships. Low precision but high damage make this weapon useful on all ranges against bigger targets, but pay attention to heat buildup. SDPS:374 HDPS:290 ALPHA(shield):312
As with all burst-variants of originals this plasma weapon provides lower accuracy but higher rate of fire and alpha damage with decreased heat efficieny. SDPS:375 HDPS:319 ALPHA(shield):335

Following the steps of Argons, Teladi developed their own capital weapon using old and tested fusion technology. Result was exactly what Teladi wanted – cheap, efficient, with great range and damage potential, while it may be a bit inaccurate it proved to be a solid choice for mid-range engagements and quite effective at taking out medium and small ships due to great rotation speed of the turret (as for capital weapon). SDPS:2333 HDPS:1667 ALPHA(shield):1400

This turret mounts a pair of upgraded version of Fusion Blaster, with lower rate of fire it still tend to fill the role of basic weaponry for all ship sizes. Moderate damage, accuracy and longer than average range make it a great jack-of-all trades weapon. SDPS:341 HDPS:284 ALPHA(shield):180

Scatter turret is simply that – a turreted heavy shotgun weapon that can obliterate any target if it would be stupid enough to get into efficient zone of this weapon. SDPS:544 HDPS:520 ALPHA(shield):68

Following the steps of Argons, Teladi developed their own capital weapon using old and tested fusion technology. Result was exactly what Teladi wanted – cheap, efficient, with great range and damage potential, while it may be a bit inaccurate it proved to be a solid choice for mid-range engagements and quite effective at taking out medium and small ships due to great rotation speed of the turret (as for capital weapon). SDPS:2333 HDPS:1667 ALPHA(shield):1400

This turret mounts a pair of upgraded version of Fusion Blaster, with lower rate of fire it still tend to fill the role of basic weaponry for all ship sizes. Moderate damage, accuracy and longer than average range make it a great jack-of-all trades weapon. SDPS:341 HDPS:284 ALPHA(shield):180

Scatter turret is simply that – a turreted heavy shotgun weapon that can obliterate any target if it would be stupid enough to get into efficient zone of this weapon. SDPS:544 HDPS:520 ALPHA(shield):68

Result was exactly what Teladi wanted – cheap, efficient, with great range and damage potential, while it may be a bit inaccurate it proved to be a solid choice for mid-range engagements and quite effective at taking out medium and small ships due to great rotation speed of the turret (as for capital weapon). SDPS:2333 HDPS:1667 ALPHA(shield):1400

This turret mounts a pair of upgraded version of Fusion Blaster, with lower rate of fire it still tend to fill the role of basic weaponry for all ship sizes. Moderate damage, accuracy and longer than average range make it a great jack-of-all trades weapon. SDPS:341 HDPS:284 ALPHA(shield):180

Scatter turret is simply that – a turreted heavy shotgun weapon that can obliterate any target if it would be stupid enough to get into efficient zone of this weapon. SDPS:544 HDPS:520 ALPHA(shield):68
Heavy variant of blaster, standard-issue weapon for most militias, cheap, efficient, with moderate damage, rate of fire and accuracy. SDPS:614 HDPS:544 ALPHA(shield):435

A burst-variant of Fusion Blaster, provides high alpha damage that can be used to shred small ships if they are not careful enough. Moderate damage, not that perfect accuracy. SDPS:669 HDPS:600 ALPHA(shield):435
A rapid-fire shotgun that is used during a short window of opportunity that can arise while fighting nimble targets. Heat-efficient with good damage. SDPS:810 HDPS:720 ALPHA(shield):45

Even heavier version of heavy scatter gun, high dispersion means low efficiency at range, but at close-up this weapon can heavily damage any target. VERY heat-efficient while having low rate of fire. SDPS:960 HDPS:864 ALPHA(shield):80
Basic blaster weapon, cheap and efficient, while boasting great projectile speed and range, damage is sub-par. SDPS:192 HDPS:192 ALPHA(shield):80
Burst-variant of the blaster weapon, higher alpha damage but lower accuracy and long reload time between bursts. SDPS:255 HDPS:255 ALPHA(shield):70
A shotgun weapon used in close-range fights. Can be a great damage-dealer if used in experienced hands. SDPS:252 HDPS:252 ALPHA(shield):28
Heavy variant of Scatter Gun, provides even higher damage output with increased scatter of the projectiles. Very efficient at point-blank ranges. SDPS:324 HDPS:284 ALPHA(shield):81

page.title: VRO text
page.t: FLAK turret was designed by Pranaid Contract Research Organization for anonymos Teladi investor to give destroyers of his security fleet ability to engage small targets on long ranges where more heavier destroyer weapons were less efficient. Good fire rate, range and speed of projectile, as well as reasanable turret turn rate make it good anti-fighter weapon. SDPS:868 HDPS:868 ALPHA(shield):550
Cruise Missile is a long-range guided missile designed to take out enemy defence stations from a safe position, while offering moderate efficiency against capital ships.
Cruise Missile Turret is a weapon system to be mounted on capital ships and defence platforms as reliable platform for Cruise Missile launch.
